price: (keadaan mereka) serupa dengan keadaan Firʻawn  dan pengikut-pengikutnya serta orang-orang yang sebelumnya. Mereka mengingkari ayat-ayat Allah, maka Allah menyiksa mereka disebabkan dosa-dosanya.  Sesungguhnya Allah Maha Kuat lagi amat keras siksaan-Nya.
arabic: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيّٞ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kadabi āli fir'ʿawna wa-alladhīna min qablihim kafarū biāyāti al-lahi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunūbihim inna al-laha qawiyyun shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
